original_text: The church leaders in Jerusalem did not argue with me. (They were the people who seemed to be the leaders. It does not matter to me whether they were really important people or not. God does not respect some people more than others.) Those leaders did not tell me to change the message that I teach.
korean_text: 유력하다는 이들 중에 (본래 어떤 이들이든지 내게 상관이 없으며 하나님은 사람을 외모로 취하지 아니하시나니) 저 유력한 이들은 내게 의무를 더하여 준 것이 없고

sentences.original_text: The church leaders in Jerusalem did not argue with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘의 교회 지도자들은 나와 다투지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were the people who seemed to be the leaders.
It does not matter to me
whether they were really important people or not.
God does not respect some people more than others.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 어떤 사람들을 다른 사람들보다 더 존중하지 않으십니다.

sentences.original_text: Those leaders did not tell me
to change the message that I teach.
